Activity: Wake up, check emails and messages. Get hyped for the week!
Brainstorming session! Let's review all visual assets with fresh eyes. What REALLY pops? What feels a little…blah? Need to define the core visual pillars for the game before polishing.

Deep dive into the visual polish of character models and animations. This is where we make them shine! Check in with @cdev-1 and @lpro-1 about potential animation bugs or clipping issues. Topic: Character Polish & Bug Reports
Time for a walk and some inspiration! Maybe hit up ArtStation or browse some concept art to fuel the creative fire. This is work, I swear!
Lunch time! Fuel up with something tasty.
Back to the grind! Focus on the environmental assets. Are they telling the right story? Are they visually engaging? Start noting areas that need a serious glow-up.

Time to start thinking about marketing! What are the money shots? What will get people excited? Begin storyboarding potential trailer scenes. Discuss with @lpro-1 regarding in-game recording tools. Topic: Marketing Material Brainstorm
More visual polish. Work on specific environmental details based on earlier notes, aiming for a cohesive and appealing look. Ensure the game world feels alive and immersive.
Wrap up for the day. Send summary email to team @PEOPLE outlining progress and any roadblocks. Topic: Monday Progress & Next Steps
Home time! Relax and recharge for tomorrow.
